title: Task 1: Describe visual elements of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately describe one visual characteristic of the Seagram Building
Response accurately describes one visual characteristic of the Seagram Building
Response accurately describes two visual characteristics of the Seagram Building

title: Task 2: Explain how a specific work of art demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not use specific visual evidence to explain how one characteristic of the Seagram Building references earlier architectural traditions.
Response does accurately use specific visual evidence to explain how one characteristic of the Seagram Building references earlier architectural traditions.

title: Task 3: Explain how a specific work of art demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not use specific visual evidence to explain how one characteristic of the Seagram Building departs from earlier architectural traditions.
Response does accurately use specific visual evidence to explain how one characteristic of the Seagram Building departs from earlier architectural traditions.

title: Task 4: Explain the meaning or significance of continuity and/or change between works of art (or a group of related works of art) within a related artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not use specific evidence to explain why the architects chose to depart from earlier architectural traditions in their creation of this work.
Response does accurately use specific evidence to explain why the architects chose to depart from earlier architectural traditions in their creation of this work.
